paragraphs.content: Summarize is an app that helps you to manage your Time, Money, and work which includes but is not limited to subject-wise studies, notes, to-do's, or office works.

Thinking when to use Summarize? To live better and managed, one should recall what they have done throughout the day daily before sleep . Also listing tasks for the next day and setting priorities increases the chances to get them done.

Currently, Summarize is under development, we will keep on adding features one by one. Till then, please feel free to manage Achievements of day, Expenses, Studies, and Time. It is a web-app that can be easily installed on all devices ( Mobile & PC ). Install the app on your devices  to keep in sync and to check how to install visit our Help page.

Note: Your data will not be used for any advertisement or offering any deal/scheme. Also our app don't need any permission to work on your device. Your privacy is important to us. For more queries, you can contact us through the support page. We are also open to feature requests and suggestions.
Summarize is an app that helps you to manage your Time, Money, and work which includes but is not limited to subject-wise studies, notes, to-do's, or office works.

It will also help you to analyze your expenditure of resources and will suggest approaches to manage them in a better way. You may find many more apps on the internet that announces to help you manage resource and increase your savings but ends up increasing your expenses by using your data to show relevant ads or offering some tempting deals.

Thinking when to use Summarize? To live better and managed, one should recall what they have done throughout the day daily before sleep . Also listing tasks for the next day and setting priorities increases the chances to get them done.

Currently, Summarize is under development, we will keep on adding features one by one. Till then, please feel free to manage Achievements of day, Expenses, Studies, and Time. It is a web-app that can be easily installed on all devices ( Mobile & PC ). Install the app on your devices  to keep in sync and to check how to install visit our Help page.

Note: Your data will not be used for any advertisement or offering any deal/scheme. Also our app don't need any permission to work on your device. Your privacy is important to us. For more queries, you can contact us through the support page. We are also open to feature requests and suggestions.

installationGuide.description: To install Summarize on your PC, simply open your web browser and check the URL bar. If you see an 'Install' button on the right side, click it. If there's no such button, look for the menu button on the top left, usually used for settings. From there, you'll find an option to Install Summarize. Click on it to install the app on your PC. Once installed, you can use it as a native software.

To install Summarize on your Android device, simply open the portal and you'll receive a popup to install the app. Click on 'Install' and it will be ready to use as a native application. If there's no popup, click on the menu button used for settings, and you'll find an option to Install Summarize. Click on it to install the app on your phone. Once installed, you can use it as a native application.

To install Summarize on your iOS device, use the share option located at the bottom center. From there, you can find an option to 'Add to Home Screen'. This will add the app to your home screen, allowing you to use it as a normal application.
To install Summarize from the Play Store, simply search for 'Summarize' and follow the installation steps.

updateInfo.question: How to get updates?
updateInfo.answer: To get updates, navigate to the About page in the app. There, you'll find version details and an update button. Simply click on the update button to receive the latest updates. If you encounter any issues with the update process, please be patient as we are actively working to resolve them.

freeCoursesSteps.title: Steps to Access Free Courses
steps: Login to the app using your Google account.
Click on 'Get Free Resource' located at the bottom of the page.
Review the available courses to see if they are helpful to you.
If yes, click on 'Get Now' to access the course.

goalDetails.title: Adventure
goalDetails.description: Embrace exciting and daring experiences, explore the unknown, and seek thrilling journeys that push your boundaries.

goalDetails.title: Business
goalDetails.description: Focus on entrepreneurial endeavors, managing and growing enterprises, and creating value in the corporate world.

goalDetails.title: Career
goalDetails.description: Set goals and work towards advancing your profession, achieving success, and finding fulfillment in your chosen vocation.

goalDetails.title: Contribution
goalDetails.description: Make a positive impact by actively giving back to society, volunteering, and supporting meaningful causes.

goalDetails.title: Creativity
goalDetails.description: Express your imagination and originality through various artistic forms, unleashing your innovative and inventive potential.

goalDetails.title: Discipline
goalDetails.description: Cultivate self-control, adhere to structured routines, and stay committed to achieving your goals through focused effort.

goalDetails.title: Donation
goalDetails.description: Generously give resources, money, or time to support charitable organizations and make a difference in the lives of others.

goalDetails.title: Education
goalDetails.description: Pursue knowledge and intellectual growth through formal learning, gaining expertise, and expanding your understanding.

goalDetails.title: Emotional Well-being
goalDetails.description: Nurture your emotional health by cultivating self-awareness, managing stress, and fostering positive emotions and relationships.

goalDetails.title: Environment
goalDetails.description: Promote sustainability, protect nature, and actively engage in preserving and conserving the environment for future generations.

goalDetails.title: Finance
goalDetails.description: Manage and grow your financial resources, make sound investment decisions, and attain long-term financial stability.

goalDetails.title: Health
goalDetails.description: Prioritize your physical well-being by adopting a balanced lifestyle, exercising regularly, and maintaining good health habits.

goalDetails.title: Home
goalDetails.description: Create a comfortable, harmonious living space that reflects your personal style and provides a sanctuary for relaxation and joy.

goalDetails.title: Language Learning
goalDetails.description: Expand your horizons by acquiring proficiency in a new language, embracing cultural diversity, and enhancing communication skills.

goalDetails.title: Organization
goalDetails.description: Bring order and structure to your life, de-clutter your surroundings, and develop efficient systems for increased productivity.

goalDetails.title: Personal Development
goalDetails.description: Continuously grow and improve as an individual, explore self-discovery, and unleash your full potential for personal fulfillment.

goalDetails.title: Productivity
goalDetails.description: Optimize your efficiency, manage time effectively, and achieve more by focusing on high-value tasks and eliminating distractions.

goalDetails.title: Relationship
goalDetails.description: Cultivate meaningful connections, build trust, and foster healthy interactions with others based on mutual respect and understanding. Nurture and strengthen bonds with family, friends, and loved ones through open communication, empathy, and quality time together

goalDetails.title: Social Connections
goalDetails.description: Build and foster a network of diverse social connections, engage in meaningful interactions, and create a sense of belonging.

goalDetails.title: Skills Development
goalDetails.description: Enhance your abilities and acquire new skills through continuous learning, practice, and seeking opportunities for personal growth.

goalDetails.title: Spirituality
goalDetails.description: Explore and connect with your inner self, seek meaning and purpose, and develop a deeper connection with the divine or higher power.

goalDetails.title: Sport
goalDetails.description: Engage in physical activities, sports, and exercises that promote fitness, competition, teamwork, and personal well-being.

goalDetails.title: Time Management
goalDetails.description: Effectively utilize and manage your time, prioritize tasks, and make the most of each day for increased productivity and fulfillment.

goalDetails.title: Travel
goalDetails.description: Embark on new adventures, explore different cultures and destinations, and broaden your horizons through enriching travel experiences.

goalDetails.title: Well-being
goalDetails.description: Take care of your overall well-being, focusing on physical, mental, and emotional health, and nurturing a balanced lifestyle.

goalSetting.title: Goal Term
goalSetting.description: Select goal term or target duration, like daily goal, tomorrow, short term or long term.Set a target date accordingly.

goalSetting.title: Goal Category
goalSetting.description: Select a category or domain for your goal, such as personal development, career, health, relationships, etc.

goalSetting.title: Goal Description
goalSetting.description: Describe your goal in detail, including what you want to achieve and why it is important to you.

goalSetting.title: Specificity
goalSetting.description: Make your goal more specific by defining measurable outcomes, setting deadlines, or identifying key milestones.

goalSetting.title: Action Steps
goalSetting.description: Outline the specific action steps or tasks you need to take to work towards your goal.

goalSetting.title: Resources Needed
goalSetting.description: Identify any resources you require to achieve your goal, such as time, money, tools, or support from others.

goalSetting.title: Potential Obstacles
goalSetting.description: Anticipate potential obstacles or challenges you might face while pursuing your goal.

goalSetting.title: Strategies and Solutions
goalSetting.description: Brainstorm and document strategies you can employ to overcome obstacles and find solutions to challenges.

goalSetting.title: Timeline
goalSetting.description: Set a timeline or target date for achieving your goal, establishing a sense of urgency and accountability.

goalSetting.title: Progress Tracking
goalSetting.description: Track your progress towards your goal using a checklist, milestones, or a progress bar.

goalSetting.title: Motivation and Rewards
goalSetting.description: Identify your motivation for achieving the goal and determine any rewards or incentives you can give yourself upon successful completion.
